title: can't start BSC on 2.29.0
body:

Erigon version: erigon version 2.29.0-stable

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : binary from release

#### Expected behaviour

Should start and continue working

and continue in cycle 
```
INFO[11-07|12:51:58.102] [snapshots] Verifying                    progress=4.59%
INFO[11-07|12:52:18.109] [snapshots] Verifying                    progress=10.07%
```
...
```
EROR[11-07|12:51:36.351] Staged Sync                              err="[1/16 Snapshots] invalid argument, fileName: v1-000000-000500-transactions.idx"
```

I've tried downloader --verify, --rebuild it finished successfully but doesn't change anything.
I recommend trying to delete the file in question: `v1-000000-000500-transactions.idx` and restart

It help to start, but now we have a bunch of other issues:
